page.title: 18ROAD SAFETY IN THE RHU AREA.
page.content: Road safety is a major cause for concern in our area.Accidents are occurring because people are not adhering to the speed limits on both the new road and on the narrow roads through the villages of Clynder and Rhu and there is growing concern that,with the proposed Trident development at the Faslane Naval Base, an even greater volume of traffic is going to cause further problems especially on the stretch of road through Rhu where there is a notoriously sharp bend leading out of the village.As the request for a by_pass to be built above the village was ruled out,Rhu and Shandon Community Council has suggested to Trident officials that as much of the heavy building materials as possible be brought into the area by either sea or rail in order to ease the situation
